      • getLoginSession

        public <L extends LoginSessionModel> L getLoginSession()
                                                throws InternalErrorException
        Returns the instance that contains the login session data model.
        Type Parameters:
        L - Class that defines the data model.
        Returns:
        Instance that contains the login session data model.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - Occurs when was not possible to get the login session.
